boardgame.name: The Agents
boardgame.description: The Agents is a strategic card game that introduces a unique double-edged card mechanism into the undercover world of covert operations, subterfuge, secrecy and sabotage. Players must join their Agents into Factions, assign Missions and take their opponents down, to gather intel and win the most points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each Agent card features a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;command_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; on one end of the card and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;points_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; on the other end. The direction in which you place the card determines from which asset you benefit. If you choose to perform the command, one of your opponents scores the points; if you keep the points for yourself, an opponent gets to perform the command. With 25 different Agents, each with its own unique ability, Agents can be turned, killed, extracted and swapped _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; making the game ever flexible, variable, unpredictable and a test of forward planning and quick thinking. As you learn about each Agent's special abilities, discover how Agents work together or against each other, and weigh up the advantages of collecting points for yourself versus using the commands to further your goals and sabotage your opponent's strategies, the game becomes increasingly complex, dynamic and challenging._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Missions, played alongside Factions of Agents, provide interesting, strategic conditions which, if fulfilled, score you big points _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but if you race ahead, you'll also become a target for attack. The better you're doing, the more under fire you'll be._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2013 Golden Geek Best Print _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Play Board Game Nominee

listing.notes: === RESERVED FOR chacon === The Agents Kickstarter Edition _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Black Box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; with Commander Promo JUST ARRIVED! New and not played, but did not come sealed in shrink. Complete and in great condition. Card List: AGENTS tuck box 36 Agent cards: - Handler (x2) - Hacker (x2) - Gunner (x2) - Extractor (x2) - Director (x2) - Abductor (x2) - Decoy (x2) - Assassin (x2) - Activist (x2) - Undercover (x2) - Temptress (x2) - Recruiter (x2) - Mercenary (x2) - Paramedic (x2) - Marksman (x2) - Interrogator (x2) - Interloper (x2) - Infiltrator (x2) 4 art cards MISSIONS tuck box 20 Mission cards: - Strength in Numbers (x1) - Poor Man’s Game (x2) - Man Down (x2) - Codebreaking (x2) - Meet your Match (x2) - Stand United (x2) - Moral High Ground (x2) - Code of Honor (x2) - Reinforcement (x2) - Chosen Few (x1) - Bloodbath (x2) 8 Commander cards: - Clout - Worth - Swipe - Peek - Mettle - Just - Foray - Edge 5 Safe-House cards 1 Saar card 1 Danny card 5 player-aid/turn-marker cards POINTS tuck box 40 Intel Point cards
Includes the kickstarter packs. There are six of them.
Opened but unplayed Kickstarter edition, no expansion packs Shipping is $6

Never played, the game came without shrink-wrap. This includes the following expansions: The Agents: Black Ops (Kickstarter edition) (2013) The Agents: Mission: Critical (English First Edition) (2013) The Agents: The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Secret_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Agents (English First Edition) (2013) The Agents: The Partners (English First Edition) (2013) Shipping rates: Germany: 4,50€ (5€ with tracking) EU: 9€ (11€ with tracking) USA: 16€ (18€ with tracking) Bank transfer preferred. Payments via PayPal will require an additional 2€ fee.

Kickstarter Version. http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/673576049/the-agents-a-double-edged-cards-game This is THE BUREAU: The FULLEST package - Base set + the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + 4 expansions + ALL stretch goals! Includes: 1) Base Game along with Kickstarter exclusives 2) http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/147401/the-agents-the-secret-agents expansion 3) http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/147405/the-agents-the-spoof-agents expansion 4) http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/147404/the-agents-the-special-agents expansion 5) http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/147403/the-agents-the-partners expansion 6) 6 sites cards (The interrogation cell, server farm, rendezvous spot, situation room, training camp, drop site) Game Condition: Excellent. Have an extra dented base game box which is holding all the expansions in it. Note that game wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t shrinkwrapped from beginning. Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling: $14.00

Reserved for Jason Myers. Includes all expansions including KS expansion to date and the game It Happens too.

This is the full kickstarter Agents game. This lot included the base game, rules, all promos, the fancy box, and all of the expansions, including spoofs. The game has been played once using the base set, the rest have only been looked at. See the pictures below. The fancy box has a small crease on one end, as you can see in the picture. This happened to most of the fancy boxes as they were not packaged well, but this one survived pretty well given how some were received. Email if you have any other questions.

Kickstarter Edition !!! Games was sent from the author without shrink wrap, but it´s new and never played .. This package includes: Base set Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack ALL stretch goals that apply to the base game and as a special extra the Black Ops Expansion *** Shipment: I´m packing with greatest care to ensure that your games arrive in perfect condition. International shipping rates (DHL, all prices in Euro): Letter (up to 0,5 kg): 3,45 € worldwide Letter (up to 1,0 kg): 7,00 € worldwide Letter (up to 2,0 kg): 17,00 € worldwide +++ inscribed letter: add 2,05 € = insured till 20,00 € or insribed letter: add 3,85 € = insured till 25,00 or extra insurence: add 1,50 € für every 100,00 € insurance. Päckchen (up to 2,0 kg): 4,10 € +++ no insurence possible Paket (up to 2,0 kg): 4,90 € Paket (up to 10,0 kg): 6,99 € Paket (up to 20,0 kg): 11,99 € Paket (up to 31,5 kg): 13,99 € Insured till 500,00 € NO ADDITIONAL FEES FOR PACKAGE! *** Payment: Within Euro-zone the EU-standard-bank-transfer (SEPA, IBAN/BIC) is recommended, it´s quick, save and causes no fees. Paypal is certainly also possible, fees within EU are 0,35 Euro + 1,9% of the total. Worldwide (outside the EURO-zone) Paypal is recommended. Paypal -fees are 0,35 Euro + (3,9% - 5,2%) of the total. For nearly all countries outside Europe, apart from USA and Canada (both 3,9%), the rate is 5.2%. The fees of the payment method you choose and the real shipping costs you have to pay. Thank you. Stephan.

1. THE AGENTS card game - decks including Agents, Points, and Missions. Rule book included. Includes all Kickstarter bonuses that will NOT be in the eventual retail release - including the Commanders Promo Pack. 2. Black Ops Expansion - please note that the card sleeve for this expansion was a litte smushed during shipping. Saar has noted in the Kickstarter that he never meant these sleeves to be permanent containers so they were not designed with strength in mind. The cards themselves are untouched and will play perfectly. NB - Shipping will be exact cost via your preferred method. NB2 - I am new to selling on BGG but not to selling online. My eBay account has 3700+ feedback - please feel free to PM for the name and then contact me through it to verify that we are indeed the same.

Near mint condition, only played twice. Only played twice and the cards are plastic so don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t really damage anyway. Has all the Kickstarter stuff. Includes these expansions...
